posts.post_title: Whoever was looking for Foster t206,I have one
posts.post_content: Can't remember who has asked frequently for a t206 Foster but if you see this and still looking for one, I have a PSA 4--Bill latzko  770 873 1181  email is [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url]
It was Adam I sent him an email. D.
